description: A plugin for the NativeScript framework implementing multiple image picker

name: nativescript-imagepicker

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd ../demo && rm -rf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-imagepicker && cd ../demo-angular && npm link nativescript-imagepicker
scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch && cd ../demo-angular && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
